GapFillDragDrop.Title: Question tags
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on the correct word and drag it to the correct gap.
GapFillDragDrop.ContentGapFillDragDrop:
1She hasn't been here recently, hasshe?
2We don't have to stay until the end, dowe?
3It would be nice to go to the beach now, wouldn'tit?
4You aren't Peter Kovacs, areyou?
5The boys can't dance as well as the girls, canthey?
6I've met your grandmother before, haven'tI?
7Jawsis one of your favourite films, isn'tit?
8We stand here during the interval, don'twe?
9She didn't give you her phone number, didshe?
10I should send her an email, shouldn'tI?
